::Spears::

Looks at Firearm, her maximal program in control, she sees him fire 
at her. She waves her hands infont of her. "NO! DON"T SHOOT! PLEASE 
DON'T..." the shots hit her in the chest and head, sending her flying 
back a few yards.  Her body landed with a thud on the ground.  

Her trainer program and maximal program were starting to fight head 
to head again. Her circuits started to smolder and she groaned as she 
lay there.   A small ribbon of smoke escaped from her neck panel and 
head gear. She slowly opened her optics, turning head slightly she 
looked up at the sky.  "What is going on?" she whispered as she 
slipped into the blackness.  Her optics flickered as her programs 
went bazerk.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer/Firearm/Kluster::
> 
> Slayer nods, walking out of the base and flying up to Savage. He 
> didn't want to retrieve Spears, but if his master commanded, it had 
> to be done...
> 
> "I am ready, Master," he says to Prebon, hovering near him.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Firearm swears, activating his comm-link as Spears yells into hers 
> again. "Cybertronian Fire," he says into it, "We're gonna have a 
> battle at the Ark very soon. I suggest sending reinforcememnts. But 
> tell them to stop by the lab and get the weapon and chip Ramulus 
> made, they'll need 'em. Tell them to install the chip. Heck, I'll 
> send you some info."
> 
> He glides in toward Spears. This needed to stop. Setting his arm 
> weapon to lowest power, Firearm fires four shots at Spears, 
> attempting to stun her. But Firearm was a bot designed for battle, 
> the lowest setting on his weapon was pretty high. While he fires, 
his 
> comp sends Kluster the info.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Kluster looks at the scanners of the Cybertronian Fire, recieving 
> Firearm's transmission.
> 
> "All available Maximals," he says through the intercom, "The Ark 
> might be attacked soon. Everyone's welcome to go defend it, but a 
> chip is neccessary for the battle. THe enemy has a mind controll 
> device, the chip will counter it. There's also a weapon that will 
> destroy the mind controll chip that their weapon fires. If you stop 
> by the lab, there should be some there. Install the chip into your 
> systems, and grab the weapon. Then head off to the Ark."
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> > "Trainers! We are leaving early and going to Spears' positio. 
I've 
> > locked onto it. She wants to return to us. We must go rescue our 
> lost 
> > comrade! And perhaps we could pick up a dead body and place the 
> spark 
> > of Lightrade in it! We must go!"
